description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including variable definitions for colors, layout styles, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application, styles the overall layout and appearance.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Styles for the container that holds the game elements.

classes.name: mode-selection
classes.description: Styles for the section where the game mode is selected.

classes.name: mode-button
classes.description: Styles for the buttons used to select the mode of the game.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styles for the game board layout.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Styles for the individual squares of the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the game status message.

classes.name: restart-button
classes.description: Styles for the button used to restart the game.
